fullText: The show’s vibe of joy and strength is crystallized in a final parade of Estela’s winningly glamorous creations (designed by Wilberth Gonzalez and Paloma Young), underlining again the affirming sentiment of the show’s title. Unsurprisingly, the audience rises again to applaud with delight.

keyPhrases.quote: The show's vibe of joy and strength is crystallized
the audience rises again to applaud with delight
